comment.ISIMIP3a: Meinshausen et al. (2011) for 1850-2005 and Dlugokencky & Tans (2019) from 2006-2019.
comment.ISIMIP3b: Malte Meinshausen, Zebedee Nicholls, et al. Future surface greenhouse gas concentrations, GMD Special Issue http://www.geosci-model-dev.net/

comment.ISIMIP3a: 1850-2014: Malte Meinshausen et al. (2016), Historical greenhouse gas concentrations, doi:10.5194/gmd-2016-169; 2015-2019: Ed Dlugokencky, NOAA/GML (gml.noaa.gov/ccgg/trends_ch4/)
comment.ISIMIP3b: Malte Meinshausen et al. (2016), Historical greenhouse gas concentrations, doi:10.5194/gmd-2016-169; Malte Meinshausen, Zebedee Nicholls, et al. Future surface greenhouse gas concentrations, GMD Special Issue http://www.geosci-model-dev.net/special_issue590.html
